#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main() {
#ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
    freopen("in.in", "r", stdin);
#endif
    int T;
    cin >> T;
    while (T --){
        string s;
        cin>>s;
        bool c1=0,c2=0;
        for(int i=0;i<s.size();i++)
        {
            if(s[i]=='1')
            {
                if(c1)
                    c2=1;
                else
                    c1=1;
            }
            else if(s[i]!='0')
            {
                c1=c2=1;
            }
        }

        if(c1 && c2)
            cout<<"YES"<<endl;
        else
            cout<<"NO"<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
